alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Keith; Lincoln; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Arthur, northeastern Keith, northwestern Lincoln and southwestern McPherson Counties through 530 PM CDT/430 PM MDT/... At 443 PM CDT/343 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kingsley Dam, or 8 miles north of Ogallala, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Keystone, Kingsley Dam, Big Bald Hill, Bucktail Lake, Nevens and Broganville. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 90 and 106. Highway 92 between mile markers 134 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
